Desc.entry: Statutory, multi-agency partnership jointly chaired by South Yorkshire Police and Sheffield City Council. Responsible for the City's crime and drugs strategy and the Youth Justice Plan. Part of Sheffield's Local Strategic Partnership Sheffield First. The partnership also oversees the development of sustainable communities by supporting key organisations to increase the number of people in the city who are involved in voluntary activities that make a positive contribution to their communities.
